name: Bechained Fruit Party
description:
*** Completely FREE ***
*** One of Best Finger-sliding and Chaining jewels elimination game on AppStore ***

Slide your finger to create chains of three or more jewels until background tiles are destroyed ... After this Keep linking jewels to make the little BEE fall down to win the game.

+++More than 180 levels and aBlitz Mode...
+++In Blitz Mode, Make highest score as possible in 60 seconds to progress and unlock BLITZ Stage !!!

***** Features *****
* Universal build: iPad, iPhone and iPod
* Blitz Mode for Hour of Fun
* 3 Specials tools to help you complete levels
* 180 Levels across 6 Stages, Bonus Stage and Blitz Stage(more coming soon)
* Graphic pack (Candy Pack and Jewel Pack)
* Game Center achievements and leaderboard
* Easy to learn but hard to master

If you like this game, please rate it and recommend it to your friends.

Have Fun !!!
